8.5. Application Form:
Each applicant is required to fill an application form, for the positions advertised, which is provided free of cost by the HR Department (Specimen attached as per Annex “A”). This application form must be filled by the applicant himself and must reach on or before the prescribed date to the HR Section. The form comprises four sections:
  • Personal Data
  • Education Qualification
  • Experience Details
  • Skills possessed by the individual
Note: In case of support staff, application form is not mandatory.

8.6. Long Listing:
After advertisement, applicants send their resume and covering letter through email or courier. The HR Department creates a pool of candidates, sorts applications/CVs, and prepares the long listing to share with the concerned Head of Department for short listing.

8.7. Short Listing:
The Head of Department, facilitated by HR, evaluates long-listed resumes on the basis of experience, qualification, gender, age, and set criteria. Suitable candidates are invited for test/interview. The HR Committee validates the short listing, then finalizes and sends it to HR for further process.
Recruitment Policy Assessment 2 of 9

According to NIDA-Pak’s recruitment process, which of the following statements is correct?

answers.option: The application form is mandatory for advertised posts (except support staff) and must be completed by the applicant, while short listing is validated by the HR Committee.
Application forms may be filled by anyone on behalf of the applicant, and the HR Committee does not review the short listing.
Long listing is prepared directly by the Head of Department without involvement of the HR Department.
Support staff are always required to fill the application form without exception.

content.correct: Correct! For advertised positions, applicants must complete the application form themselves (except support staff), and the HR Committee validates the short listing prepared with HR’s facilitation.
content.incorrect: Sorry, that’s not correct. The correct statement is that applicants must personally fill the application form (except for support staff), and the HR Committee validates the short listing.
